title: Tran the man
creator_credit: Rowan Woods, Siobhan Hannan and AFTRS
brief_description: Ray Moss has been nicknamed “Tran” by his Asian workmates in his job as a security guard at a shopping centre in suburban Cabramatta. For Ray, the heat is on. His brother Donny and Uncle Jack have had their heroin business undercut by Asian-controlled competition in Cabramatta and Donny and Jack want Ray as their go-between. Cast features David Wenham as Ray/”Tran”.
